data.comment: In the minute -5, Derley (Fortaleza) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
The first-half is in progress. Fortaleza get the game underway.
Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
In the minute 2, Fortaleza needs to be cautious. Bahia have an attacking throw-in.
Bahia are whistled for offside.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 2, Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
Can Fortaleza capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bahia's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 4, Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Fortaleza just outside Bahia's area.
Juninho Capixaba is booked for the home team.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes has awarded Fortaleza a corner.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Bahia.
Throw-in for Bahia close to the penalty box.
Bahia takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 11, Ball safe as Fortaleza is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 15, Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
Throw-in Bahia.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Bahia's half.
In the minute 17, Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes has awarded Fortaleza a corner.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a throw-in for Fortaleza, close to Bahia's area.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
Fortaleza takes a corner from the right.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 22, The away team replace Roger Carvalho with Carlinhos.
Gabriel Dias (Fortaleza) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Nino Paraiba (Bahia) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to Bahia.
Bahia drive upfield and Elber gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fortaleza defender.
Juninho scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 24, Juninho Capixaba with an assist there.
Fortaleza have a dangerous throw-in.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Fortaleza in their own half.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Bahia.
In the minute 30, Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Gabriel Dias for Fortaleza who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Nino Paraiba (Bahia) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Fortaleza's Gabriel Dias is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 35, Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a Bahia throw-in in Fortaleza's half.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Bahia in the half of Fortaleza.
Paulao (Fortaleza) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Juninho Capixaba is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 43, Juninho Capixaba (Bahia) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Bahia takes a corner from the left.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Salvador.
In the minute 44, Juninho Capixaba is back on the pitch.
In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Ball safe as Fortaleza is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Fortaleza.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has commenced. Bahia with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Throw-in high up the field for Bahia in Salvador.
Goal kick for Fortaleza at Arena Fonte Nova.
Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 49, Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Bahia.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 50, Fortaleza's Romarinho misses with an attempt on goal.
Bahia have a goal kick.
Ronaldo (Bahia) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 51, Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Fortaleza.
Gilberto of Bahia gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 53, Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
Elber of Bahia smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 55, Fortaleza are coming forward and David gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Gilberto.
In the minute 58, Fortaleza awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gilberto is back on his feet again.
Fortaleza are caught offside.
In the minute 61, Bahia's Gilberto is on target but unsuccessful.
Bahia pushes forward through Elber, whose finish on goal is saved.
Bahia are pushing forward but Edson's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Fortaleza at Arena Fonte Nova.
David (Fortaleza) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes has awarded Fortaleza a corner.
In the minute 65, Bergson (Fortaleza) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
Great play from Osvaldo to set up the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Salvador.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Bahia in the half of Fortaleza.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Bahia.
Felipe (Fortaleza) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 71, Goal! Gilberto gives Bahia the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 2-1.
Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
In the minute 73, Bahia make their first substitution with Elton replacing Nino Paraiba.
Rodriguinho is on a sub for Daniel for Bahia.
Clayson is replacing Elber for the home team.
In the minute 75, Corner awarded to Bahia.
Bahia drives forward and Fessin gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Goal kick for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 77, Saldanha is replacing Gilberto for the home team.
Fortaleza make their second substitution with Wellington Paulista replacing David.
Yuri Cesar is on a sub for Osvaldo for Fortaleza.
In the minute 79, Throw-in Fortaleza.
Fortaleza takes a corner from the left.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
In the minute 82, In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The away team replace Romarinho with Tinga.
Anderson Martins is on a sub for Edson for Bahia.
In the minute 84, Anderson Martins is booked for the home team.
Free kick Fortaleza.
Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
In the minute 86, Wellington Paulista (Fortaleza) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Bahia have a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Free kick Fortaleza.
Ronald is replacing Felipe for the away team.
Ronald (Fortaleza) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a throw-in for Fortaleza, close to Bahia's area.
Throw-in for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Fortaleza.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Fortaleza in Salvador.
Ball safe as Fortaleza is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bahia needs to be cautious. Fortaleza have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Fortaleza are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
